---
title: Get Access Token
api: POST /auth/token
authMethod: basic
name: clientId:secretKey
---

<Info>
	Please note that the **clientId** and **secretKey** from your dashboard are to
	be used as your **username** and **password**
    "Authorization": "Basic " + base64encode("**clientId**:**secretKey**")

</Info>

<ResponseExample>

```json
{
	"data": {
		"accessToken": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..g475CjbgAOUr1E8O_RgM0yNl76P_4kiIAoFiTpEX-AA",
		"tokenType": "Bearer",
		"expiresAt": "3600"
	},
	"message": "Completed successfully",
	"status": "success",
	"statusCode": 200,
	"errors": []
}
```

</ResponseExample>
